entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0065.7502] The Supplemental cash flow section has reported a value of 1,342,000 for the element us-gaap:InterestPaid but the element InterestPaidNet is not included in the supplemental cash flow section. Interest Paid Net of the capitalized component must be reported in this section. The element us-gaap:InterestPaid includes capitalized interest. If this element has no capitalized interest component then use the element InterestPaidNet instead.
The properties of this us-gaap:InterestPaid fact are: Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7502 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/850261/000085026118000013/srne-20171231.xml 6689

[DQC.US.0008.6819] The calculation in the extension taxonomy from ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax to ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in 1003000 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Comprehensive Income (Loss) is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation. ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with a value of 3,014,000 is represented as a child of us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in the companies extension taxonomy role 1003000 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Comprehensive Income (Loss). The element us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest however, is represented either as a sibling or child of a sibling relative to us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in the us-gaap taxonomies. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest and the child element us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest.
The properties of this us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest fact are:
Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/850261/000085026118000013/srne-20171231.xml 6275

property.name: label
property.value: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0047.7481] In the company's extension taxonomy the concept Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities includes us-gaap:DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease as a summation-child. The concept us-gaap:DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease should not appear as a child of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities because it does not have a balance type. Increase (Decrease) items without balance attributes are used in a roll forward and should not be used in the cash flow statement as they represent the impact on the balance sheet item which is the opposite of the impact on cash.
Rule Element Id:7481 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -
